localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

nodes.excerpt: Pod Stack is an easy-to-use Notion template that helps you create & manage your podcast. You'll find hundreds of prebuilt components, tools, and resources. From episode preparation to monetization, we have you covered. Get $5 off with "producthunt"!
nodes.title: Pod Stack - Create & manage your podcast with this Notion template.
nodes.author: Tem Nugmanov

nodes.excerpt: Sender is an affordable (4x cheaper than MailChimp!) and super easy to use email marketing platform with all essential email marketing features, solid deliverability, and top-notch support.
nodes.title: Sender - Super easy and affordable email marketing platform
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Enter a link to any web resource to get a new one that you can schedule to be released at a time of your choice and share it to keep your audience engaged.
nodes.title: Urlcast.io - Hide an URL as long as you want

nodes.excerpt: Beacons is a mobile website builder for creators on TikTok and Instagram, with e-commerce and monetization built in. Set up a beautiful page in one minute.
nodes.title: Beacons - Monetize your TikTok, Twitter, and Instagram bio links
nodes.author: Hiten Shah

nodes.excerpt: https://illustrationkit.com is a collection of premium open-source illustrations with new illustration added daily. Currently - 110+ scenes - 55+ characters - Character creator for figma & sketch - New illustration added daily - Roadmap to add 300+ illustrations
nodes.title: Illustration Kit - Premium open source illustrations updated daily
nodes.author: Dilpreet Singh

nodes.excerpt: You probably have a few social media accounts... We built Luma to be your home online, between the big networks. Share your Luma to connect with your audience, showcase your content, and make money.
nodes.title: Luma Profile - A homepage for creators to showcase their content
nodes.author: Victor Pontis

nodes.excerpt: ICONFi is a digital asset savings platform. ICONFi lets you earn interest on your digital assets including BTC, ETH, ICX, and USDT, and provides a simple solution for staking ICX. ICONFi helps you grow your investments with a simple, secure user interface.
nodes.title: ICONFi - Keep your savings simple with ICONFi.
nodes.author: Molly Waldron

nodes.excerpt: No more messy bookmarks. No more missing out. Dev Resources has everything a developer needs, presented in curated lists. Improve your skill set, find assets, discover your next favourite tool and get great discounts on digital products â€” all in one place.
nodes.title: Dev Resources - Collaborative list of resources for developers
nodes.author: Marcel Cruz

nodes.excerpt: Robot coffee shop using off-the-shelf equipment to customize their menu faster and offer a large variety of drinks at a lower price than other robot coffee shops.
nodes.title: Robo Esso - Automated coffee shop using off-the-shelf hardware
nodes.author: Freeman LaFleur

nodes.excerpt: Sell any digital product in under a minute and keep 99% of what you make after payment processing fees. No monthly fees either.
nodes.title: Flurly - The easiest way to sell digital products online
nodes.author: SAIF

nodes.excerpt: Get a video call and scheduler feature into your services in the blink of an eye. Wondercall 2.0 is the more powerful embedded video call system for any website & app. Now you can not only make calls but also schedule them. And the way to check all engagement!
nodes.title: Wondercall 2.0 - Add video call and scheduler into any service in seconds
nodes.author: Howie Young

nodes.excerpt: Switch off. Slow down. Sundayy is the mindfulness based social network designed to be checked just once a week. Sundayy represents spending time away from feeds, thinking deeper about our days, and sharing what matters with the people who matter.
nodes.title: Sundayy - The social network you check once a week, on Sunday.
nodes.author: Jillian Schuller

nodes.excerpt: A growing list of various types of emails (promotional, newsletter, onboarding, etc.) from the best brands, breaking down and highlighting everything you need to know about each email. Learn how the top brands create their emails!
nodes.title: Email Spotlights - The best brand emails, annotated.
nodes.author: Alec Beglarian

nodes.excerpt: With Upvoty, you can easily collect and manage all of your customer's feedback. Share your roadmap and communicate updates with the Changelog. Now, all available in Dark mode! ğŸ–¤
nodes.title: Upvoty Dark Mode - User feedback, roadmap, and changelog in dark mode ğŸ–¤

nodes.excerpt: AirConsole Meet lets you instantly play games with your team in Zoom, Google Meet or any other video conferencing service. The games allow colleagues to bond together while working from home. Perfect for team building during the pandemic.
nodes.title: AirConsole Meet - Play games in video calls with your team
nodes.author: Rafael Morgan

nodes.excerpt: Pika (pronounced piÂ·kuh, like picker) is an easy to use, open-source, native colour picker for macOS. Pika makes it simple to quickly find colours on screen, in the format you need, so you can get on with being a speedy, successful designer.
nodes.title: Pika - An open-source colour picker app for macOS
nodes.author: Chris Messina

nodes.excerpt: Appy Pie Chatbot Builder is a cloud based software that lets you create custom answer bots without any coding and add it to your website in minutes. Start with easy templates and customize your answer bot with an intuitive drag-n-drop interface. Get Started.
nodes.title: Appy Pie Chatbot - Create intelligent answer bots without any coding

nodes.excerpt: Scan anything: objects, people, pets, text, books, and documents. Scan Thing uses cutting-edge machine learning and computer-vision algorithms. You don't need internet access, an account, or a subscription. There's no data collection, no ads, and no nonsense.
nodes.title: Scan Thing - Quickest way to capture and save anything around you
nodes.author: Pierre Liebenberg

nodes.excerpt: Socialize with your coworkers through fun games right in your Slack workspace. It's free while we're in Beta! Games: - Spot the Faker: A game of accusations and deception - Medium Roast: Roast your colleagues (SFW) - Trivia: 50+ categories, 5k+ questions
nodes.title: Bored for Slack - Play social games with your coworkers on Slack
